snippet: Xinhua, China’s official news agency, took a position on the Obama administration’s new military strategy that was sharper than the line publicly taken by Beijing officials.
abstract: China's state-run news media warns the United States against engaging in 'war mongering' a day after the Obama administration outlined a new military strategy with an increased focus on China.
lead_paragraph: Xinhua, China’s official news agency, took a position on the Obama administration’s new military strategy that was sharper than the line publicly taken by Beijing officials.

headline.seo: Chinese News Agency, Xinhua, Warns U.S. Against ‘Militarism’
headline.main: Chinese News Agency Warns Against U.S. Moves
headline.print_headline: Chinese News Agency Issues Warning Against U.S. Moves
